channel.title: Pest Control Help
channel.description: how do i change the rewards in pest control and how many points you get per game?

item.title: Pest Control Help
item.dc:creator: @OwnageDBOW OwnageDBOW
item.description:
@OwnageDBOW wrote:

No! The rewards are in ClickingMost.Java search for c.pcPoints

Then you will see these

if(c.option == 2 && c.pcPoints > 75 && System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastAction > c.actionInterval){ c.sM("You have been rewarded full void knight!"); c.addItem(2520, 1); c.addItem(2522, 1); c.addItem(2518, 1); c.addItem(2524, 1); c.addItem(2526, 1); c.pcPoints -= 200; c.closeInterface(); c.actionInterval = 6000; c.lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); }

if(c.option == 2 && c.pcPoints > 75 && System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastAction > c.actionInterval){ c.sM("You have been rewarded full void knight!"); Message you receive when finished purchasing.

c.addItem(2520, 1); c.addItem(2522, 1); c.addItem(2518, 1); c.addItem(2524, 1); c.addItem(2526, 1); What you get.

c.pcPoints -= 200; Amount of points it costs

[code]c.closeInterface();
c.actionInterval = 6000;
c.lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
}

Donâ€™t know, or care.[/code]
